title: marwell
author: marwell
content: For many newcomers, the crypto market starts with Bitcoin. As experience grows, they become more and more focused on the rest of the pack – altcoins. Coinzh, a global cryptocurrency exchange with roots in Hong Kong, is where your journey of discovering them may well begin. The exchange was founded in March 2020 and is now headquartered in London. It enables trading over 100 cryptocurrencies, big and small, which makes it one of the most comprehensive exchanges in the world. But it’s not only about the wide range of cryptos available for trading, but also about the ways of making the trades. In addition to common order types like limit and market orders, the platform supports more advanced order types such as batch orders and conditional orders (for example, Post Only, Stop Loss & Take Profit, One Cancels Other). With these, you can devise and fine-tune your trading strategies, no matter how simple or sophisticated they might be. Algorithmic traders will enjoy the fast and efficient API that Coinzh supplies. Now you can build your own trading bots and take advantage of arbitrage opportunities that the crypto market offers in abundance. The platform charges one of the lowest trading fees among cryptocurrency exchanges. Deposits are free of charge, and you only pay the minimal withdrawal fee (also one of the lowest across the board) or no withdrawal fee at all (depends on a cryptocurrency).Modern exchanges can be way too complex and confusing, with lots of elements and options that can easily get in the way. Coinzh features a polished and clear interface that streamlines and improves user experience. Whether you are an inexperienced user or a veteran trader, you will remain focused on your trades and not on how to make them.The lack of security can instantly make all the benefits and advantages of an exchange worthless. That’s why Coinzh places special emphasis on offering industry-grade security. To protect your account, you can whitelist withdrawal addresses, enable 2FA, turn on SMS and email confirmations. And should you run into any problems or just happen to have questions, the multilingual help desk is available 24/7 to help you out.        Come try it out and see what Coinzh has to offer!Website: https://coinzh.com/Business Contacts: business@Coinzh.comSupport Center: support@coinzh.com

comments.author: Ximeeshaki
comments.body: The exchange is very young. It is favorable to her that they work in Hong Kong. I know that there is very strict legislation and there is a very large punishment for financial fraud. Even better, the exchange now operates legally in Europe

comments.author: Oamarcisc
comments.body: This exchange has many advantages: a lot of trading pairs, the ability to withdraw in cash. Still, they still have one problem. They have a problem with marketing. New participants must constantly come to the exchange. They have great conditions for beginners but they don't advertise it much. If you remove this problem it will be top.

comments.author: NeuroticFish
comments.body: I don't know... an exchange nobody heard of, advertised by somebody who has negative feedback for posting link to fake wallet and some newbies.I would be very careful with this. I don't say it's legit or not, but without some more reliable reviews I'd just stay with the known exchanges. Sorry.

comments.author: Piersemi
comments.body: Quote from: Ximeeshaki on October 24, 2022, 06:16:17 AMThe exchange is very young. It is favorable to her that they work in Hong Kong. I know that there is very strict legislation and there is a very large punishment for financial fraud. Even better, the exchange now operates legally in EuropeIt's good that they do not fall under sanctions and still do not ask for KYC. But it's bad that they can have few partnerships because of this. Some projects will not want to list them. This needs to be worked on. Now everyone loves to trade altcoins, so they need to be on the exchange as much as possible!

comments.author: stompix
comments.body: Quote from: NeuroticFish on October 24, 2022, 01:10:20 PMI don't know... an exchange nobody heard of, advertised by somebody who has negative feedback for posting link to fake wallet and some newbies.Just the 4 "newbies" that are shilling this exchange is a red flag large enough to make everyone cautious about it, on top of that this is an exchange with no location, email-only contact, no license, no info about the company running, even their ToS links are broken.But there is more, that template is a cheap copy and they usually reuse it, so what the morons did in this case? Scammers seems pretty desperate now.I received an email. The exchange is currently running a marketing campaign and users can receive prizes for reviewing the exchange. Why not take part. These are tough times for traders and I would personally appreciate any opportunity.

comments.author: dbgeyhs
comments.body: Take the time to study this exchange. Didn't find anything suspicious. The first test deposit went very quickly. Crypto withdrawal is also very fast. But personally I did not like the interface.

comments.author: Piersemi
comments.body: they forgot to replace all links, and guess what kudx was??Another HK "based"  exchange shilled by a bought account that went full scamhttps://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5411525.0https://www.trustpilot.com/review/kudx.com[/quote]What links are you talking about? Personally, I have already checked the exchange. I am not an active trader, im holder but if the exchange offers bonuses, then I take them. Here I received all the bonuses and withdraw the tokens without any problems.

comments.author: Espingtony
comments.body: Last two years I used this exchange only few times for few tokens trading. But last 3 month I using this exchange properly. In my experience this exchange are quite good but bitcoin and some alt coin withdraw fee are high but ltc withdraw fee low. Overall good exchange and I give 4.5 star out of 5.

comments.author: Feorgess
comments.body: Quote from: Olimp2009 on October 23, 2022, 12:35:44 PMCoinzh have numerous points of interest than their rival like Registration rewards and low expense. what's more, I will give my conclusion about this Exchange which in my view is among the best stages for exchanging tokens or cryptographic forms of money. Its foundation is straightforward and extremely simple to deal with, and as I see it has a wide assortment of exchanging sets, this is significant for those hoping to benefit from exchanges.Now they can ban mining in Europe. So it seems to me not very good that they are now officially in Europe. Regulation is bad. Coinzh is very convenient for trading. I hope that here and earlier it will be possible to trade without KYC

comments.author: MrLighttttt
comments.body: Quote from: Espingtony on October 30, 2022, 06:26:32 AMLast two years I used this exchange only few times for few tokens trading. But last 3 month I using this exchange properly. In my experience this exchange are quite good but bitcoin and some alt coin withdraw fee are high but ltc withdraw fee low. Overall good exchange and I give 4.5 star out of 5. I was interested in this because it is a very high rating. At first glance, the exchange is really good. I was very interested in the rewards for registration and deposit. It is clear that the exchange is only 2 years old and it needs even more traders. It sounds really good, I definitely have to try it.

comments.author: stompix
comments.created_time: October 31, 2022, 05:27:03 AMLast edit: May 20, 2023, 07:27:31 PM by stompix
comments.body: Quote from: Piersemi on October 29, 2022, 11:07:34 AMWhat links are you talking about? Personally, I have already checked the exchange. Yeah, you should have double checked before launching the new scam my dearQuote from: dbgeyhs on October 28, 2022, 12:48:23 PMTake the time to study this exchange. Didn't find anything suspicious. The first test deposit went very quickly. Crypto withdrawal is also very fast. But personally I did not like the interface.What a coincidence, another account that was tagged for scamming people with a fake exchange, bnax, kudx, why not coinx this time, guess it was taken?I guess it's time to tag all these fake newbies, and just a heads up to save both of us some work, you stop shilling this scam and I won't open for each shilling post a topic named "Coinzh is a scam", sounds fair to me, deal?

comments.author: Piersemi
comments.body: What a coincidence, another account that was tagged for scamming people with a fake exchange, bnax, kudx, why not coinx this time, guess it was taken?I guess it's time to tag all these fake newbies, and just a heads up to save both of us some work, you stop shilling this scam and I won't open for each shilling post a topic named "Coinzh is a scam", sounds fair to me, deal?[/quote]Lol why should I care? I shared my opinion and I will be rewarded for being active on forum, cryptocurrency projects in most cases are scams, at the moment I have no doubts about this exchange!

comments.author: masonnard
comments.body: Apparently this is indeed a very good exchange if competitors spend money on people writing bad reviews about it. For 1.5 years I have not had any problems when trading on the stock exchange. She works perfect. My withdrawal requests are processed for a maximum of 20 minutes. So I don’t know why people write bad things, but such is our world where people are ready to say the most terrible things for money.

comments.author: Bekahlil
comments.body: I have been trade on the exchange for over a year. Constantly participate in all activities. And now I support their idea about the competition with reviews. I can only say good things about coinzh. For all the time there were no problems. it is very good that the exchange does not hang during high volatility. we all know how top exchanges can crash when there is a big pump or dump. this has never happened before on coinzh, which makes it stronger than many other exchanges!

comments.author: Nawani
comments.body: I like everything on the exchange, but I can not understand only one thing. Why doesn't the exchange create a farming pool or liquidity pairs? This also attracts users very much and encourages them to buy crypto in order to put it at interest. You need to seriously think about opening this on your exchange!

comments.author: Blenniamont
comments.body: I miss my reward! I want to be able to earn money if I have more than a small deposit. There are exchanges where they distribute drops and spend such a thing here. I highly recommend that the creators of the exchange think about the existing market requirements.
